item.summary: jackrabbit-packagetype validation fails for content package with .cfg.json OSGi configurations

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
There is a typo in https://github.com/apache/jackrabbit-filevault/blob/42f8aa605855637a81bdb80446564cdc0ded9888/vault-validation/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/vault/validation/spi/impl/PackageTypeValidatorFactory.java#L72. The default value for configuration additionalJcrInstallerFileNodePathRegex is supposed to be 

.*\\.(config|cfg|cfg\\.json|jar)

but instead it is 

.*\\.(config|cfg|cfg\\\\.json|jar)

The issues vanish once the parent plugin configuration is tweaked like this:

<plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.jackrabbit</groupId>
          <artifactId>filevault-package-maven-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>1.2.0</version>
          <configuration>
              <validatorsSettings>
                  <jackrabbit-packagetype>
                      <options>
                          <additionalJcrInstallerFileNodePathRegex>.*\.(config|cfg|cfg\.json|jar)$</additionalJcrInstallerFileNodePathRegex>
                      </options>
                  </jackrabbit-packagetype>
              </validatorsSettings>
          </configuration>
        </plugin>
Implemented workaround in Maven plugin for usage with FileVault 3.5.4 in https://github.com/apache/jackrabbit-filevault-package-maven-plugin/commit/84e3d8947d3bb268fb119017d708354fb94e3782.
